title: [5 YoE, Unemployed, Graphic Designer, USA]
text:
Nolan Nickel  
nolan.nickel@email.com | (555) 012-3456 | Los Angeles, CA | nolannickel.design | linkedin.com/in/nolannickel

PROFILE

Graphic Designer with 5+ years of experience delivering high-impact visual solutions across digital and print for mission-driven, B2B, and nonprofit brands. Proven success leading cross-functional design projects that strengthen brand presence, boost engagement, and drive strategic growth. Adept at translating complex ideas into clear, purpose-driven visuals, including presentations, reports, social media campaigns, and event collateral that build trust and resonate with diverse audiences. Proficient in Adobe Creative Suite, PowerPoint, WordPress, and Figma.

DESIGN SKILLS

Branding • Presentation Design • Illustration • Event Collateral • Layout Design • Print Design  
Animation • Social Media Content • Photography • Video Editing • Basic Animation • Web Graphics

SOFTWARE

InDesign • Photoshop • Illustrator • After Effects • Premiere Pro • Lightroom • Canva

Brightwood Studio | 2023 – Present  
• Drive brand visibility by creating high-impact design solutions and sales enablement materials, including presentations, for nonprofit and B2B clients.  
• Drive engagement and conversions by designing cross-platform campaigns, including one-pagers, social content, and email graphics.  
• Accelerate project turnaround by managing multiple design requests efficiently in agile, remote workflows.

Graphic Designer  
Eden Reforestation Projects | 2020 – 2023

• Managed end-to-end print production process including file prep, vendor coordination, and press checks for event materials and donor communications.

Long Beach Blues Society | 2018 – 2019
